## LinkPressOptions.ignoreHashChange property

Don't trigger an event when the target `href` is inside the page, e.g. `#top`<!-- -->. See also [handleHashChangeFeature](./webshell.handlehashchangefeature.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ignoreHashChange?: boolean;
```
